content.question: The sequence of interactions between Mr. and Mrs. Pontellier helps establish the central focus of the passage primarily by moving from

choices.label: quiet chatting to insults to vociferous defiance
casual disagreement to conflict to hostile silence
animated discussion to confrontation to decisive resolution
thoughtful conversation to speculation to anxious consultation

content.answer: casual disagreement to conflict to hostile silence

skill.text: Skill 3.A: Identify and describe how plot orders events in a narrative.
